name: Phil Aylesworth
bio: With over 15 years of public accounting and business advisory service experience in the Tongas, Ecuador, Canada, Botswana and the US, Phil is the most seasoned and diversed member of the XY Corp. team.

name: Darren Takaki
bio: Darren is the Director of Development for XY Corp. Darren creates learning materials for XY Corp. as well as consulting for customers to integrate Solutions into their production pipeline and business processes.

name: Andrew Steele
bio: Andrew joined XY Corp. in October 1999 as XY Corp's first Human Resources Director. As such, he has overall human resources responsibility for XY Corp's operations worldwide.

name: Mike Girimonte
position: Vice President of Sales and Marketing
bio: Mike serves as the Vice President of Sales and Marketing for XY Corp. In this role Mike oversees XY Corp's marketing and corporate communications efforts worldwide.

name: Kunj Patel
bio: Kunj Patel is a dedicated student at Saint Clair College, where he is pursuing a course in Web Development. With a deep passion for technology and coding, he is on a journey to master the art of web development and design. Beyond the digital realm, Kunj also enjoys the thrill of cricket on the field and the creativity of cooking in the kitchen. He believes in the power of continuous learning and strives to make the most of every opportunity that comes his way.
